node.category: What is the way things are?
Should everyone contribute to the funding of public broadcasters?
What are reasons not to contribute to the funding of public broadcasters?

node.surface: Of course there are a number of programmes in public broadcasting that are not worth the licencing fee,
and others, such as “Musikantenstadl” and soap operas, are only interesting to certain audiences.
Nevertheless, everybody should contribute to the funding of the public broadcasters in equal measure,

node.category: Why should everybody contribute to the funding of the public broadcasters in equal measure?

node.surface: for we need general and independent media.

node.category: Why do we need general and independent media?

node.surface: After all we want to get our view of the world neither through the lens of the government nor through that of rich media entrepreneurs.
